title: Create image-assets
name: CreateImage
description: Images uploaded to this endpoint are stored locally on the backend server. This is only a fall back option when AWS is no longer available.

title: Create image-assets
name: CreateImageAws
description: Images uploaded to this endpoint are stored on AWS.

title: Retrieve all image-assets
name: RetrieveImages
description: image-assets name and url are stored on db. The images themselves are stored on the AWS Bucket. The url points to it.

title: to get the form for uploading images
name: RetrieveUploadForm
description: The sample form allows you to test the API by uploading and image and entering the image name that would be saved on db
